law.catch_line: Application and construction -- Uniformity of interpretation.
law.text: KRS 382.800 to 382.860 shall be applied and construed to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the laws with respect to conservation easements among states enacting them.
law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 251, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1988.
